schema.description: 节点的ID。您可参见[ListNodes](~~173979~~)查看NodeId相关信息。
运行的环境，包括DEV（开发环境）和PROD（生产环境）。
指定查询节点为上游节点还是下游节点。包括input和output。

RequestId.description: 请求的ID，用于定位日志，排查问题。

responseDemo:
[{"type":"json","example":"{
  "HttpStatusCode": 200,
  "RequestId": "E6F0DBDD-5AD****",
  "ErrorMessage": "The project does not exist.",
  "ErrorCode": "Invalid.Tenant.ProjectNotExists",
  "Success": true,
  "Data": [
    {
      "TableName": "dataworks_a.datastudio_tenant_waitres_alarm",
      "Data": "dataworks_a.1234_out",
      "NodeId": 123123
    }
  ]
}","errorExample":""},{"type":"xml","example":"<RequestId>E6F0DBDD-5AD****</RequestId>
<HttpStatusCode>200</HttpStatusCode>
<Data>
    <NodeId>123123</NodeId>
    <TableName>dataworks_a.datastudio_tenant_waitres_alarm</TableName>
    <Data>dataworks_a.1234_out</Data>
</Data>
<ErrorCode>Invalid.Tenant.ProjectNotExists</ErrorCode>
<ErrorMessage>The project does not exist.</ErrorMessage>
<Success>true</Success>","errorExample":""}]
title: 查询上下游节点信息
summary: 查询上下游节点的信息，只能查询一层。
